summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the payment of the cost and expense of the condemnation of Ferdinand Street, from Ferdinand street as platted in Jefferson Heights Division No. 1, an addition to the City of Seattle, to the west margin of 28th Avenue South as platted in McCoy's Addition to Columbia (now a part of the City of Seattle,) produced south; as provided in Ordinance No. 43382 of said City, by the issuance and sale of bonds of the district created to pay therefor.
